short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage Coze resources and chat in browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Coze (https://www.coze.com) is an AI application development platform for users to develop and deploy generative AI applications in a safe, secure, and responsible way. â€‹

Coze Master helps you manage your Coze resources and chat with Coze AI agents directly in the browser with a dedicated interface to import web pages into Coze knowledge bases and interact with Coze chatbots.

Coze Master will be your AI powered bookmark system that store any web content you would like to revisit at any time.

Key features:
1. Import any web page you are viewing into specified Coze knowledge base.
2. Chat with your Coze agent.

More features to come. Stay tuned!

Change logs:
*2025-01-05*
Updated the user experience. First time user will see token configuration panel when it sees the popup. It will be more friendly for new users.
